item.description:
@ReaperXScape wrote:

you either need to make it send a random message in that one method, or make more methods like it (not recommended)
I would suggest using this:

public String[] messages = {"Message1", "Message2", "Message3", "Message4", "Message5", "Message6", "Message7", "Message8"};
public int totalMessages = 8; //make sure this is the number of messages you have

public void mymessage() {
        EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() {
            public void execute(EventContainer c) {
                sendMessage("[@red@SERVER NOTICE@bla@]: "+ messages[Misc.random(totalMessages - 1)]);
            }
        }, 100000); //Time it takes to send the message (in milliseconds) (1000 = 1 second)
    };
